import Cookies from'js-cookie';export var isLogged=function isLogged(){var token=Cookies.get('token');return token?true:false;//operador ternario que verifica se existe um token para poder retorna-lo
};export var doLogin=function doLogin(token){var rememberPass=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;if(rememberPass){Cookies.set('token',token,{expires:999});}else{Cookies.set('token',token);}};export var doLogout=function doLogout(){Cookies.remove('token');};
